snippet: David Beckham will return to Major League Soccer, this time as an owner of a new club in Miami, the league is expected to announce at a news conference Wednesday.
abstract: David Beckham is set to return to Major League Soccer, this time as an owner of a Miami team that will become the league’s 22nd club; league has held off on the awarding of the team only because it requires new clubs to have a stadium plan in place; Beckham’s ownership group does not yet have a completed stadium deal, but announcement is a sign that the league is confident one is close.

byline.original: By KEN BELSON and ANDREW DAS

lead_paragraph: David Beckham will return to Major League Soccer, this time as an owner of a new club in Miami, the league is expected to announce at a news conference Wednesday.

headline.main: Beckham Back, as an Owner of a New Team
headline.print_headline: Beckham Back, as an Owner of a New Team
